trans-unit.source: Can be used with the "jQuery-FractionSlider", the "Professional jQuery Content Slider Plugin - Slider Pro" or the "Slider revolution".
Sets the width of the layer. Can be set to a fixed or percentage value (px or %).
Sets the height of the layer. Can be set to a fixed or percentage value (px or %).
Sets the depth (z-index, in CSS terms) of the layer
Sets the position of the layer
Sets the horizontal position of the layer, using the value specified for data-position as a reference point (px or %)
Sets the vertical position of the layer, using the value specified for data-position as a reference point (px or %)
Sets the transition of the layer when it appears in the slide
Sets an offset for the position of the layer from which the layer will be animated towards the final position when it appears in the slide
Sets the duration of the show transition [ms]
Sets a delay for the show transition [ms]
Sets the transition of the layer when it disappears from the slide
Sets an offset for the position of the layer towards which the layer will be animated from the original position when it disappears from the slide
Sets the duration of the hide transition [ms]
Sets a delay for the hide transition [ms]
Sets how much time a layer will stay visible before being hidden automatically [ms]
